For the development of speech recognitio: भारतीय भासांभीतर उलोवप वळखुपी नमुने विकसित करपाखातीर, विंगडविंगड भारतीय आवाजांचो मुक्त माहितीसाठो गरजेचो आसा. वाक्यांश तुमका भारतीय आवाजांचो व्यापक मुक्त माहितीसाठो तयार करपाखातीर मुखार सरून तुमच्या आवाजाचे योगदान दिवपाखातीर निमंत्रित करता.भारतीय भासांभीतर उलोवप वळखुपी नमुने विकसित करपाखातीर, विंगडविंगड भारतीय आवाजांचो मुक्त माहितीसाठो गरजेचो आसा. वाक्यांश तुमका भारतीय आवाजांचो व्यापक मुक्त माहितीसाठो तयार करपाखातीर मुखार सरून तुमच्या आवाजाचे योगदान दिवपाखातीर निमंत्रित करता.
The key to building speech recognition m: आवाज वळखुपी नमुने तयार करपाची चावी तुमी विंगडविंगड राज्यां, बोली, उच्चार, लिंग आणि वयोगटांनी दिता त्या योगदानाच्या माहितीच्या विविधतायेंत आसा. देशभरांतल्या ह्या विविधतायेचे प्रमाण आमका आमच्यो भाशा सशक्त करपाखातीर सामूहिक शक्त दितात.
Username cannot be more than 12 characte: वापरप्याले नाव 12 अक्षरांपरस चड आसपाक शकना.

We do not have any data for this languag: We do not have any data for this language, would you like to contribute for it?
An open data strategy will enable the va: मुक्त माहितीसाठो धोरण आपापल्या भाशेविशी ध्येयवादी आशिल्ल्या विंगडविंगड भाशा समूहांक, व्यक्ती आणि तंत्रज्ञांक आवाज वळखुपी अनुप्रयोग विकसित करपाक, आणी समाजाच्या बऱ्याखातीर विंगडविंगड डोमेन्सांनी तांची एकात्मताय साधपाक सक्षम करतले.
Our multilingual DNA is still a missing: डिजिटल पयली धोरणांत आमचौ भौभाशिक डीएनए अजून अस्तित्वांत ना
India being a vast multilingual country,: भारत हो एक भौभाशिक देश आशिल्ल्यान, भारताची 90 टक्के लोकसंख्या ही तांची शैक्षणिक, सामाजिक आणि डिजिटल कामा करपाखातीर प्रादेशिक भाशांचेर अवलंबून रावता.
As the volume of internet users multipli: इंटरनेट वापरप्यांचे प्रमाण वाडटा आणी वित्तीय, शैक्षणिक आणि आर्थिक कामांखातीर डिजिटल मंचांची मागणी येता, तशी भारतीय भाशांनी पयली विचार करपाक लागपाची गरज उप्रासता.
Winning back our languages by introducin: आमच्या पर्यावरणीय व्यवस्थेंत स्थानिकीकरण हाडून आमच्या भाशांक परतून एक फावट जैतिवंत करूया.
There is a felt need for a speech recogn: भारतीय भाशांनी खाशेली आशिल्ल्या आवाज वळखुपी तंत्रज्ञानाची गरज आसा, जे उच्च अचुकताय साधतले आणी वेगवेगळ्या भारतीय भाशांच्या वापरप्यांच्या दिसपट्ट्या भाशिक आणी संवादाच्या कामांच्या लागी आसतले.
Speech recognition is a technology that: आवाज वळखप हे तंत्रगिन्यान उलोवपाचे तत्काळ मजकुरांत रुपांतर करता. भारतीय भाशांखातीरचो असो नमुनो विंगडविंगड क्षेत्रांनी डिजिटल पयली नमुनो तयार करपाची क्षमताय बाळगिता, जशे शिक्षण, आरोग्य आणि माध्यमां.
The tools, utilities and models proposed: विकसित करपा आशिल्ले साधन, सुविधा आणि नमुने वाक्यांश जनसहभागी मंचावेल्या मुक्त स्त्रोत योगदान दिवप्यांचेर अवलंबून रावतले.
Speech recognition relies on \"machine-l: Speech recognition relies on "machine-learning" technology that requires huge collections of datasets that include diversified Indian voices and the corresponding text. Through Vakyansh, EkStep wants to create a diverse open repository of Indian voice speaking Indian language which can be used for this initiative.
As a team, we are inviting you to join u: संघ म्हणून आमी तुमका आमका सामील जावपाक आपयता आणी तुमचो 30 मिनिटांमेरेनचो आवाज ह्या उपक्रमाखातीर दिवपाचे मागता. एकाच फावट तुमचो आवाज ध्वनिमुद्रित करप कठीण जाव येता म्हणून आमी आमच्या संकेतस्थळाचेर तुमचेखातीर सोपे उपाय येवजिल्यात, जंय तुमी जाय ते फावटी येवन जंय सोपिल्ले थंयच्यान सुरवात करपाक शकतात.
Every minute of your contribution will m: तुमच्या योगदानाचे प्रत्येक मिनिट खूप व्हड बदल घडयतले आणि आमका आमच्या उद्दिष्टालागी हाडतले.
EkStep Foundation gathers partners and c: एकस्टेप फाऊंडेशन भागीदार पुंजायता आणी घुस्पागोंदळाचे सामाजिक प्रश्र्न सोडोवपाखातीर मुक्त साधनसुविधा, साधनां आणी आराखडो तयार करता. आमी तयार केल्ली सनबर्ड ही मुक्तस्त्रोत डिजिटल साधनसुविधा वापरून आणी सोशियेटल प्लॅटफॉर्म अप्रोच नावाची विचार आणी कार्यपद्दत अनुसरून आमी हे करतात.
EkStep is a not-for-profit organization: एकस्टेप ही नफ्याखातीर नाशिल्ली संस्था रोहिणी आणी नंदन नीलेकणी आणी शंकर मरुवाडा हाणी स्थापन केल्या.

Bolo India: A crowdsourcing initiative f: Bolo India: A crowdsourcing initiative for Indian languages
India needs to be Atma Nirbhar in the ar: India needs to be Atma Nirbhar in the area of speech recognition in Indian languages. Hence, we want to create an open data repository of many Indian voices. This is an effort by MeitY, Government of India, under the National Language Translation Mission (NLTM). This effort is supported by EkStep Foundation on a pro-bono basis and leverages its open source work under sunbird.org along with various other open source frameworks.
Bolo India invites you to volunteer and: Bolo India invites you to volunteer and contribute your voice for this cause. All your contributions are automatically processed and made available as open data in a useful fashion back to the community. Such data then can be used by all language enthusiasts and technologists to develop world class speech recognition applications.
India is a land of many languages, our d: India is a land of many languages, our digital strategy must reflect it.
90% of India's population uses region la: 90% of India's population uses region languages to conduct their day-to-day activities.
As more and more people use digital plat: As more and more people use digital platforms for financial, educational and social activities, digital platforms must work seamlessly in Indian Languages.
We need to build speech recognition tech: We need to build speech recognition technologies that are tuned for your language.  It must have high accuracy and understand the daily language and communications of people in your language.
Having open world class speech recogniti: Having open world class speech recognition in your language will enable a digital first model in your language in various sectors such as: education, healthcare and media.
The tools, utilities and models propose: The tools, utilities and models  proposed to be developed in your language will rely on open source contributions through Bolo India crowd sourcing platform
Speech recognition relies on \"machine-l: Speech recognition relies on "machine-learning" technology that requires large datasets that include diverse voices and the corresponding text. Through Bolo India, we want to create a diverse open repository of Indian voices speaking Indian languages which can be used for this initiative
We are inviting you to join us and volun: We are inviting you to join us and voluntarily contribute your voice to this initiative. Recording your voice at one stretch can be overwhelming hence you can do this by visiting the website multiple times and commence from where you left us off
